full_summary:
===========================

### W6837-224746 Ductwork Cleaning Contract

#### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for standing offers (RFSA) for ductwork cleaning services to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston.

#### Key Details

* **Tender Number:** W6837-224746
* **Tender Title:** Ductwork Cleaning
* **UNSPSC Code:** 72151003 (Heating System Maintenance and Repair Service)
* **Publication Date:** February 1, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None (time and materials contract)
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to suppliers from Canada and countries covered by various trade agreements, including the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

#### Tender Requirements

The successful supplier shall provide ductwork cleaning services for CFB Kingston, including cleaning air supply, return air, exhaust systems, and dryer vents as required. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

#### Key Documents and Contacts

* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670100?extsite=MTg2NzAxMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18670100?extsite=MTg2NzAxMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Contact Info:** Terri Stork (SPAC/PSPC), terri.stork@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

---
